personal_information.name: Database Administrator
personal_information.location: Chesapeake Bay Program Office, Columbia, MD

professional_summary: Experienced Database Administrator with expertise in MS SQL Server, ETL, and data-driven technical solutions. Proficient in SCRUM and Kanban methodologies, with a focus on database administration, performance monitoring, and optimization.

key_responsibilities: Developing ETL tools for large data loads.
Implementing DBA maintenance plans and scheduled task scripts.
Migrating databases from SQL 2008R2 to SQL 2014.
Documenting MS SQL Server database designs
Reviewing and deploying SSIS packages with large datasets.
Creating database design and development standards.
Designing and creating workflow diagrams for business processes.
Generating multiple Database Dictionaries and Entity Relationship Diagrams using Navicat.

technical_skills:
DATABASE",
            "ETL",
            "EXTRACT, TRANSFORM, AND LOAD",
            "MS SQL SERVER",
            "SQL",
            "SCRUM and Kanban methodologies
